EmailTemplate.subject: Be Ready for Anything with Honeywell's Maintenance Service Plan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.mascoservice.com/]]>
When the unexpected happens, count on the Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics, formally known as HAPP, to ensure that your aircraft is flight-ready. Among the many benefits of the protection plan is full coverage on exchanges and repairs at Honeywell’s global network of sales and service centers so you can get back in the air quickly.
More than 3,800 aircraft are currently covered by Honeywell Maintenance Service Plans globally, providing owners and operators with quality, experience, and peace of mind.
When time is of the essence, Honeywell’s Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics will get you back in the air – fast. Ask for a quote by contacting Spirit Aeronautics, an authorized Honeywell dealer, at (614) 344-9195 <tel:614-344-9195> or online by clicking below.
